data.title: ZIP Code 49348 - Wayland Michigan
data.meta_description: Wayland MI ZIP Code 49348 Profile, Map, Demographics, Politics and School Attendance Areas - Updated August 2024
data.text:
ZIP Code 49348 is located in Wayland Michigan. Portions of 49348 are also in Leighton Township and Wayland Township and Dorr Township and Yankee Springs Township and Hopkins Township and Gaines Charter Township and Moline. 49348 is primarily within Allegan County, with some portions in Barry County. Regionally, 49348 is located in the Grand Rapids-Kalamazoo-Battle Creek Area.

49348 Demographics

49348 can be classified socioeconomically as Lower Middle Class class compared to other ZIP Codes in Michigan based on Median Household Income and Average Adjusted Gross Income. The majority race/ethnicity residing in 49348 is White. The majority race/ethnicity attending public schools in 49348 is White. The current unemployment level in 49348 is 5.0%.
